queries.query: INSERT INTO `api_accesslogs` (`vIPAddress`, `vAPIName`, `vAPIURL`, `dAccessDate`, `vPlatform`, `vBrowser`, `vFileName`) VALUES ('108.235.29.71', 'send_message', 'http://18.211.58.235/canoodle/WS/send_message', '2020-11-18 14:01:29', 'Unknown OS Platform', 'Unknown Browser', 'send_message-1605708089.json')

SELECT `uc`.`iUserId` AS `bu_blocked_to`,`uc`.`iConnectionUserId` AS `bu_blocked_by` FROM `user_connections` AS `uc` WHERE (uc.dtAddedAt IS NOT NULL AND uc.dtAddedAt <> '') AND ((uc.iUserId = 14 AND uc.iConnectionUserId = 13) OR (uc.iUserId = 13 AND uc.iConnectionUserId = 14)) AND `uc`.`eConnectionResult` = 'Block'  LIMIT 1

SELECT `m`.`iMessageId` AS `m_message_id` FROM `message` AS `m` WHERE `m`.`iMessageId` = 'CmI2jrlZeZf5wC0x6CCC' OR (m.iSenderId IS NOT NULL AND m.iSenderId <> '') AND (m.iSenderId = 14 AND m.iReceiverId = 13) OR (m.iSenderId = 13 AND m.iReceiverId = 14)  LIMIT 1

SELECT `s`.`iUserId` AS `s_users_id`,`r`.`iUserId` AS `r_users_id`,`r`.`vDeviceToken` AS `r_device_token`,CONCAT(s.vFirstName," ",s.vLastName) AS s_name FROM `message` AS `m` LEFT JOIN `users` AS `s` ON `m`.`iSenderId` = `s`.`iUserId` LEFT JOIN `users` AS `r` ON `m`.`iReceiverId` = `r`.`iUserId` WHERE (m.iSenderId = 14 AND m.iReceiverId = 13)  LIMIT 1

SELECT `n`.`iNotificationId` AS `notification_id` FROM `notification` AS `n` WHERE `iUserId` IN('14') AND `vNotificationMessage` IN('Chetan Chaudhari  has sent you a message.') AND `iNotifierId` IN('13')

INSERT INTO `notification` (`vNotificationMessage`, `iNotifierId`, `eNotificationType`, `dtAddedAt`, `dtUpdatedAt`, `eNotificationStatus`, `iUserId`) VALUES ('Chetan Chaudhari  has sent you a message.', '13', 'Message', NOW(), NOW(), 'Active', '14')
SELECT `ui`.`vProfileImage` AS `ui_image`,`ui`.`iUserId` AS `ui_users_id` FROM `users` AS `ui` WHERE `ui`.`iUserId` = '14'  LIMIT 1

INSERT INTO `mod_push_notifications` (`vUniqueId`, `vDeviceId`, `eMode`, `eNotifyCode`, `vSound`, `vBadge`, `vTitle`, `tMessage`, `tVarsJSON`, `eDeviceType`, `dtAddDateTime`, `tSendJSON`, `dtExeDateTime`, `eStatus`) VALUES ('441a2', 'DCF08894E38E48ABC0A41CE8268ADDEB98DB66E35E6AE073EF7E24CCD083249A', 'live', 'USER', '', 0, '', 'Chetan Chaudhari  has sent you a message.', '[{\"key\":\"type\",\"value\":\"Message\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"receiver_id\",\"value\":\"13\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_id\",\"value\":\"14\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_name\",\"value\":\"Chetan Chaudhari\",\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_profile\",\"value\":null,\"send\":\"Yes\"},{\"key\":\"user_image\",\"value\":\"http:\\/\\/18.211.58.235\\/canoodle\\/WS\\/image_resize\\/?pic=aHR0cDovLzE4LjIxMS41OC4yMzUvY2Fub29kbGUvcHVibGljL2ltYWdlcy9ub2ltYWdlLmdpZg==&height=100&width=100&color=FFFFFF\",\"send\":\"Yes\"}]', 'iOS', '2020-11-18 14:01:29', '{\"aps\":{\"badge\":0,\"sound\":\"received.caf\",\"alert\":{\"body\":\"Chetan Chaudhari  has sent you a message.\"}},\"code\":\"USER\",\"id\":\"441a2\",\"type\":\"Message\",\"receiver_id\":\"13\",\"user_id\":\"14\",\"user_name\":\"Chetan Chaudhari\",\"user_profile\":\"\",\"user_image\":\"http:\\/\\/18.211.58.235\\/canoodle\\/WS\\/image_resize\\/?pic=aHR0cDovLzE4LjIxMS41OC4yMzUvY2Fub29kbGUvcHVibGljL2ltYWdlcy9ub2ltYWdlLmdpZg==&height=100&width=100&color=FFFFFF\"}', '2020-11-18 14:01:29', 'Executed')
